## Add My Message to Bulletin Board

### Description
Adding my message/quote/note to the TechSTART November collaborative bulletin board.

### Checklist
- [ ] I have created a file named `[my-username].json` in the `messages/` folder
- [ ] My JSON file follows the format specified in `messages/README.md`
- [ ] My message is appropriate and respectful
- [ ] I have used my GitHub username as the filename

---

**Thank you for contributing to the TechSTART November workshop! ðŸŽ‰**
